meanings.definition: The act of playing the position of linebacker in football.
meanings.sent1: During the game, his linebackering was exceptional, stopping many plays.
meanings.sent2: Linebacking requires quick reflexes and strong tackling abilities.
meanings.sent3: The linebackering skills of the team were so good, they made the opponents look like beginners.
meanings.sent4: Her linebackering was like a shield protecting the team from any offensive moves.
meanings.sent5: The coach emphasized the importance of linebackering in their defensive strategy.

meanings.definition: The skill or technique of defending against the run or pass in football as a linebacker.
meanings.sent1: His linebackering was crucial in stopping the opponent's running game.
meanings.sent2: Linebacking involves reading the offense and reacting quickly to make plays.
meanings.sent3: The linebackering of the team was so strong, it felt like they had an extra player on the field.
meanings.sent4: Her linebackering was like a wall that the opponents couldn't break through.
meanings.sent5: The intensity of his linebackering inspired the whole team to step up their game.
